description: Manage, browse, and import agent skills locally. Supports Claude, Cursor, Codex and more.
viewsContainer.title: Skill Dock
view.library.name: Skill Library
view.repoSkills.name: Repo Skills
view.marketplace.name: Skill Marketplace
welcome.library:
No skills found in your library.
[Create New Skill](command:skilldock.createSkill)
[Open Skill Library Folder](command:skilldock.openLibraryFolder)
welcome.repoSkills:
No skills found in this repository.
[Import Skill from Library](command:skilldock.importSkill)
welcome.marketplace:
Browse and install agent skills from GitHub.
[Open Marketplace](command:skilldock.openMarketplace)
[Add Custom Source](command:skilldock.addMarketplaceSource)
config.libraryPath.description: Custom path for the skill library. Defaults to ~/.skilldock/skills
config.defaultTarget.description: Default target format when importing skills to a repo
config.showRepoSkills.description: Show the Repo Skills panel in the sidebar
config.marketplaceSources.description: Additional GitHub repository URLs to scan for agent skills in the Marketplace
config.librarySortBy.description: Sort order for the skill library tree view (name, lastModified, author, mostUsed)
